Text: Typical I seeded till at least 4 people had 100% and everyone hit and ran. You left 20 people at 99%; you parasites  don't appreciate how difficult it was to get some of these movies, then you piss it away when you've had your piece of the pie. I have 2 more movies I didn't add to this collection that aren't available as torrents. I won't be uploading them because the effort to share is not appreciated, your loss and not mine.
